code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')));const navigate=useNavigate();const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('user');setUser(null);navigate('/login');};useEffect(()=>{setUser(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.nav,{className:"bg-blue-600 text-white p-4 flex justify-between items-center",initial:{y:-50,opacity:0},animate:{y:0,opacity:1},transition:{duration:0.5},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"font-bold text-xl",children:"Matty"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-4",children:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:user.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:logout,className:"bg-red-500 px-3 py-1 rounded",children:"Logout"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"bg-white text-blue-600 px-3 py-1 rounded",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",className:"bg-white text-blue-600 px-3 py-1 rounded",children:"Register"})]})})]});};export default Navbar;
